    Character

    The Character class acts as the base for both NPCs and Players. It is _opinionated_ about how stats are calculated (see getMaxAttribute), if you want to change what stats a player has and how they are calculated it should be changed here and in `Attributes.js`

    Constructor

    new Character()
    Character.js, line 30

    Properties:
    Name Type Description
    name string Name shown on look/who/login
    inventory Map
    combatants Set Enemies this character is currently in combat with
    level number
    attributes object
    effects EffectList List of current effects applied to the character
    skills Map List of all character's skills
    room Room Room the character is currently in
